name: mikroe.click.rmstodc2
short_description: RMS to DC 2 Click is a compact add-on board that converts the RMS of the input signal into a DC voltage. This board features the AD8436, a low-cost, low-power, true RMS-to-DC converter from Analog Devices. The AD8436 is a translinear precision, low-power, true RMS-to-DC converter that delivers true RMS or average rectified value of AC waveform. It features high accuracy, a wide dynamic input range (100μV rms to 3V rms), a wide bandwidth of up to 1MHz, and more. This Click board™ makes the perfect solution for the development of various true RMS digital multimeter applications, panel meters and gauges, AC + DC measurement applications, a true RMS measurement of an audio signal, and other similar applications that require accurate RMS value readings.
